name: spong and the dark decent
description:
A sequel/Remake of a ONwS fangame spong and the lost ones while also being a fangame of five nights of wario's, hope you enjoy!

oh yeah, this series was officialized and approved by Shoodigity https://shoodigity.itch.io

DISCORD

https://discord.gg/G8cY7zBDHE

STORY

16 days before the events of FNAW and 4 days before the events of SATLO

Bruno gates, now desperate for anything to cure his daughters sickness, he preforms many odd jobs until he manages to find a high paying job available.

The job is very simple, go into the undergrounds of wario's factory and find a ancient book of spells and curses, however, when Bruno stepped one foot into the mineshaft, the cave suddenly collapses, trapping Bruno into a cavern

normally that wouldn't be that horrible if Bruno was not followed by spong along with awaking several other abomination's who want Bruno dead.

Credits
